text: Muhammad Alwi Slamat (born 16 December 1998) is an Indonesian professional footballer who plays for Liga 1 club Persebaya Surabaya as a midfielder, he can also operate as a full-back.about PSMS MedanM. Alwi Slamat ==Career== ===Semen Padang=== Alwi joined Semen Padang F.C. in 2015 Sudirman Cup, Alwi also joined Semen Padang in 2016 Indonesia Soccer Championship A. Although up to the fifth week, he has not played a match.Daftarkan 28 Pemain, Ini Target Semen Padang di ISC ==Honours== ===Club=== ;PSMS Medan * Liga 2 runner-up: 2017 ;Persebaya Surabaya * Liga 1 runner-up: 2019 * Piala Presiden runner-up: 2019 * East Java Governor Cup: 2020 ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Indonesian footballers Category:People from Tulehu Category:Semen Padang F.C. players Category:Liga 1 (Indonesia) players Category:Sportspeople from Maluku (province) Category:Association football midfielders Category:Association football defenders
title: Muhammad Alwi Slamat
